TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventSchemaTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 将端对端事件的跟踪或调试输出定向到 XML 编码的符合架构的日志文件。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output of end-to-end events to an XML-encoded, schema-compliant log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了端到端符合架构的事件的跟踪。The class provides tracing of end-to-end schema-compliant events. 可以为具有可跨线程的系统使用端到端跟踪，进程和计算机边界。You can use end-to-end tracing for a system that has heterogeneous components that cross thread, , process, and computer boundaries. 标准化的事件架构 (请参阅[Event Representation for Event Consumers](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=78955)) 被定义为跨越这些边界中启用跟踪。A standardized event schema (see [Event Representation for Event Consumers](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=78955)) has been defined to enable tracing across these boundaries. 此外，该架构允许添加符合架构的自定义元素。The schema enables the addition of custom, schema-compliant elements. 可以使用[Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129)来显示事件数据。You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the event data. 具有隐式支持的无锁跟踪的日志记录性能优化。 is tuned for logging performance with implicit support for lock-free tracing. 类将跟踪和调试信息的 XML 编码的文本流。The class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream. 稍后在本部分中的表中显示的 XML 输出说明。The description of the XML output is shown in the tables later in this section. 可以启用或禁用应用程序配置文件中，通过对象，然后使用已配置在应用程序中的对象。You can enable or disable an object through the application configuration file, and then use the configured object in your application. 另外，可以创建在代码中的对象。Alternately, you can create an object in your code. 我们建议你通过应用程序配置文件启用跟踪侦听器。We recommend that you enable trace listeners through the application configuration file. 有关使用跟踪和调试配置文件的信息，请参阅[跟踪和调试设置架构](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/index.md)。For information about the use of configuration files for tracing and debugging, see [Trace and Debug Settings Schema](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/index.md). 若要配置对象，修改配置文件对应于你的应用程序的名称。To configure an object, modify the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加、 删除或设置侦听器的属性。In this file, you can add, remove, or set the properties for a listener. 应按如下所示设置格式的配置文件：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` 类继承属性从基类。The class inherits the property from the base class . 属性，可为另一级别的跟踪输出在侦听器的筛选。The property allows for an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener. 如果存在，则筛选器`Trace`方法的跟踪侦听器调用筛选器以确定是否发出跟踪的方法。If a filter is present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace. 如果尝试写入的文件正在使用或不可用，GUID 后缀是自动添加到的文件的名称。If an attempt is made to write to a file that is being used or is unavailable, a GUID suffix is automatically added to the file name. > [!NOTE] > 侦听器方法旨在由方法调用， ，和类。Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the , , and classes. 不要直接从应用程序代码调用侦听器方法。Do not call the listener methods directly from application code. 侦听器主要是以供类。The listener is primarily intended for use by the class. 下表介绍的元素和属性的 XML 输出。The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output. |元素Element|特性Attributes|输出Output|说明Notes| |-------------|----------------|------------|-----------| |`CallStack`|无None|取决于是否存在标记中属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|特殊字符如 > 或 < 使用转义序列替换。Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences. 请参阅下一步的表中的转义的字符转换表。See the escaped character translation table in the next table.| |`Computer`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|此元素表示的值的属性。This element represents the value of the property.| |`Correlation`|`ActivityID`|始终存在。Always present.|如果`ActivityID`未指定，默认值为空 GUID。If `ActivityID` is not specified, the default is an empty GUID.| ||`RelatedActivityID`|取决于是否存在`relatedActivityId`中的参数`Trace`方法调用。Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the `Trace` method call.|`RelatedActivityID`属性对应于`relatedActivityId`参数的方法。The `RelatedActivityID` attribute corresponds to the `relatedActivityId` parameter of the method.| |`Data`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|此元素表示参数输入 (`data`)。This element represents parameter input (`data`). 为每个数据对象提供一个元素。One element is provided for each data object. 在事件日志的情况下`Data`元素包含转义的 XML 数据。In the case of event logs, the `Data` element contains escaped XML data. 如果数据日志`Data`元素包含非转义的数据。In the case of data logs, the `Data` element contains unescaped data. 日志数据的输出使用`ToString`传入的数据对象的方法。The data log output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.| |`Event`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|此元素包含一个跟踪事件。This element contains a trace event.| |`EventData`|无None|存在事件日志。Present for event logs.|此元素表示参数输入 (`message`， `args`)。This element represents parameter input (`message`, `args`). 它包含`Data`元素与通过调用创建的转义 XML 数据方法。It contains `Data` elements with escaped XML data that is created by calling the method.| |`EventID`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|此元素表示参数输入 (`id`)。This element represents parameter input (`id`).| |`Execution`|`ProcessID`|取决于是否存在标记中属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|`ProcessID`中指定属性。The `ProcessID` attribute is specified in the . 在 Microsoft Windows 98 和 Windows 千禧年 Edition 操作系统中，如果`ProcessID`大于 2147483647，它是负数的正值表示形式并应将转换为获取正确的进程标识符。On the Microsoft Windows 98 and Windows Millenium Edition operating systems, if `ProcessID` is larger than 2,147,483,647, it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.| ||`ThreadID`|当存在`ProcessID`存在。Present when `ProcessID` is present.|`ThreadID`中指定属性。The `ThreadID` attribute is specified in the .| |`Level`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|此元素表示参数输入 (的数值`eventType`)。This element represents parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`). 参数大于 255 的值是输出为级别 8，它表示。Parameter values that are larger than 255 are output as a level 8, which represents . 跟踪事件类型， ， ， ，和分别作为级别 1、 2、 4、 8 和 10 中，为输出。Trace event types , , , , and are output as levels 1, 2, 4, 8, and 10, respectively.| |`LogicalOperationStack`|无None|取决于是否存在标记中属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|只有一个逻辑操作可以存在。Only one logical operation can exist. 因此，作为写入值`LogicalOperation`节点下的`LogicalOperationStack`元素。Therefore, the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.| |`OpCode`|无None|当存在`Level`大于 255。Present when `Level` is greater than 255.|此元素表示跟踪事件类型具有大于 255 的数字值。This element represents Trace event types that have numeric values greater than 255. ， ， ，或分别作为级别 1、 2、 4、 8 和 10 中，为输出。, , , , or are output as levels 1, 2, 4, 8, and 10, respectively.| |`Provider`|`GUID`|始终存在。Always present.|始终为空。Always empty.| |`RenderingInfo`|`Culture`|始终存在。Always present.|此属性表示事件类型的资源字符串。This attribute represents a resource string for the event type. 它始终是"en EN\\"。It is always "en-EN\\".| |`System`|`Name`|始终存在。Always present.|| |`TimeCreated`|`SystemTime`|取决于是否存在标记中属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|时间是的值属性。The time is the value of the property. 此属性表示为协调世界时This property is expressed as Coordinated Universal Time| |`TimeStamp`|无None|取决于是否存在标记中属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|此元素中指定。This element is specified in the .| |`UserData`|无None|存在数据日志。Present for data logs.|此元素包含`Data`元素与从非转义、 用户提供数据方法。This element contains `Data` elements with unescaped, user-provided data from a method.| 下表显示 XML 输出中转义的字符。The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output. 转义发生在所有元素和特性除外`UserData`元素，它包含用户提供，进行非转义的数据。Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes except for the `UserData` element, which contains user-provided, unescaped data. `UserData`元素是对的调用结果方法。The `UserData` element is a result of calls to the method. |转义字符Escaped character|“值”Value| |-----------------------|-----------| |&|&| |\<|<| |>|>| |""|"| |\|'| |0xD0xD|&\#xD;&\#xD;| |0xA0xA|&\#xA;&\#xA;| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and specified buffer size, using the specified file with the specified log retention policy and maximum size as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关性能注意事项`bufferSize`和`maximumFileSize`应为 1024 个字节的倍数。For performance considerations, `bufferSize` and `maximumFileSize` should be multiples of 1024 bytes. `maximumFileSize` 不是一个绝对值，它是一个阈值，它可能会被超出最大大小的最后一条消息。`maximumFileSize` is not an absolute value, it is a threshold which can be exceeded up to the size of the last message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. summary.span: 获取输出缓冲区的大小。

span.span: Gets the size of the output buffer.

value.span: 输出缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size of the output buffer, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性值`bufferSize`构造函数中的参数。The property value is set by the `bufferSize` parameter in the constructor. 出于性能原因，缓冲区大小应设置为 1024 字节的倍数。For performance reasons, the buffer size should be set to a multiple of 1024 bytes. 我们建议 32 \* 1024 字节的默认大小，或者 64\*1024 个字节，为了获得最佳性能。We recommend either the default size of 32\*1024 bytes or 64\*1024 bytes for best performance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示的值属性。The following code example demonstrates how to display the value of the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. summary.span: 获取日志文件的最大大小。

span.span: Gets the maximum size of the log file.

value.span: 最大文件大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum file size, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性值`maximumFileSize`构造函数中的参数或`maximumFileSize`配置文件中的属性。The property value is set by the `maximumFileSize` parameter in the constructor or the `maximumFileSize` attribute in the configuration file. 出于性能原因，您应设置最大文件大小为 1024 字节的倍数。For performance reasons, you should set the maximum file size to a multiple of 1024 bytes. 属性值不是绝对; 它是一个阈值，可能会被超出最大大小的最后一条消息。The property value is not an absolute; it is a threshold that can be exceeded up to the size of the last message. 下表显示了文件大小与每个跟踪日志保留选项相关联的可能的和默认值。The following table shows the possible and default values for file size that are associated with each trace log retention option. 标记为不适用的值，指示属性不会检查为此，值。The values marked as N/A indicate that the property is not checked for that value. |TraceLogRetentionOptionTraceLogRetentionOption|最大文件大小Maximum file size|默认文件大小Default file size| |-----------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------| ||不可用N/A|-1-1| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ||>0>0|4 KB4 KB| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示的值属性。The following code example demonstrates how to display the value of the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性值`maximumNumberOfFiles`构造函数中的参数或`maximumNumberOfFiles`配置文件中的属性。The property value is set by the `maximumNumberOfFiles` parameter in the constructor or the `maximumNumberOfFiles` attribute in the configuration file. 下表显示文件大小和文件计数与每个跟踪日志保留选项相关联的可能和默认的值。The following table shows the possible and default values for file size and file count that are associated with each trace log retention option. 标记为不适用的值，指示属性不会检查为此，值。The values marked as N/A indicate that the property is not checked for that value. |TraceLogRetentionOptionTraceLogRetentionOption|最大文件数Maximum number of files|文件默认数量Default number of files| |-----------------------------|-----------------------------|-----------------------------| ||不可用N/A|11| ||不可用N/A|11| ||不可用N/A|-1-1| ||>0>0|11| ||>1>1|22| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示的值属性。The following code example demonstrates how to display the value of the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、单个数据对象和事件信息写入日志文件。

span.span: Writes trace information, a single data object, and event information to the log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`标头和跟踪页脚中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`都会在写入前，将参数转换为无符号整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，负`id`值编写为一个较大的正整数。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data`形式写入参数`Data`中的节点`UserData`元素。The `data` parameter is written as a `Data` node in the `UserData` element. `ToString`数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由方法调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`标头和跟踪页脚中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`都会在写入前，将参数转换为无符号整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，负`id`值编写为一个较大的正整数。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 中的对象`data`方式编写参数数组`Data`中的节点`UserData`元素。The objects in the `data` parameter array are written as `Data` nodes in the `UserData` element. `ToString`的每个数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of each data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由方法调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted message, and event information to the log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`标头和跟踪页脚中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`都会在写入前，将参数转换为无符号整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，负`id`值编写为一个较大的正整数。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 调用方法和`format`字符串和`args`数组作为参数传递。The method is called and the `format` string and `args` array are passed in as parameters. 此方法设置的格式`args`对象数组，并将写入格式化的数组作为`Data`中的节点`EventData`元素。This method formats the `args` object array and writes the formatted array as the `Data` node in the `EventData` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应由应用程序代码直接调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 它由方法调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

span.span: A structure that identifies a related activity.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息（包括相关活动的标识）、消息和事件信息写入日志文件。

span.span: Writes trace information, including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information, to the log file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于关联相关的跟踪。The method is used to correlate related traces. `eventCache`， `source`， `id`，和`relatedActivityId`标头和跟踪页脚中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`都会在写入前，将参数转换为无符号整数。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before it is written. 因此，负`id`值编写为一个较大的正整数。Therefore, a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`形式写入参数`Data`元素。The `message` parameter is written as the `Data` element. 调用方法来转换`relatedActivityId`"B"的值格式的字符串，它显示在标头。The method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId` value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header. `Opcode`页脚中的元素标识跟踪事件的类型为。The `Opcode` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 不应由应用程序代码调用方法。The method should not be called by application code. 它旨在由发出的跟踪信息的对象及其方法。It is intended to be used by a object to emit the trace information for its method.
